lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Seafarers' International Union, which represents about 2,300 workers on the Great Lakes and the ocean coasts, has said it will likely go on strike this spring to protest employers' demands for wage rollbacks and other concessions.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. delegation to promote the seaway to shippers in Western Europe should result in some increased traffic this season but the full benefits won't be felt for several years, Blair said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Depressed grain exports, rising costs, and competing modes of transportation are all expected to result in only a marginal increase over last year's traffic levels -- and revenues -- on the 2,300 mile waterway, officials said.
